scripts.e2e:cypress: npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env mock=true --config video=false
scripts.delete:reports: rm mochawesome-report/* || true && rm junit-report/* || true
scripts.poste2e: npm run combine:junit && npm run combine:mochawesome
scripts.combine:mochawesome: mochawesome-merge mochawesome-reports/*.json > mochawesome-report/mochawesome.json && marge mochawesome-report/mochawesome.json && rm -rf mochawesome-reports
